[艮]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 目 ( “ eye ” ) + 人 ( “ person ” ) — a person looking back ( Ji Xusheng, 2004 ) to introduce the concept of disobedience and/or limit. Similar but unrelated to 見 .

[良]
Pictogram ( 象形 ). Possibly depicts corridors and a room, in which case it would be the original form of 廊 . See also the top component of 复 . Unrelated to 食 , 艮 and 即 .
